properties.query:
Veeam_GetSecurityEvents
| where instanceId == 25500
| extend AccountName =  extract("AccountName=\"(?<AccountName>[^\"]*)\"", 1, SyslogMessage)
| project
    Date = format_datetime(TimeGenerated, 'dd.MM.yyyy HH:mm'),
    DataSource = original_host,
    EventId = instanceId,
    UserName = user,
    ["Credential Record"] = AccountName,
    MessageDetails = Description,
    Severity = SeverityDescription
properties.name: Credential Record Deleted
properties.description: Detects when a credential record is deleted from Veeam Backup & Replication. This might indicate unauthorized removal of critical components.
